description: This file defines the DashboardScreen widget for a Flutter app, managing the main dashboard with tab navigation, transaction data fetching, and user logout functionality.

classes.name: DashboardScreen
classes.description: Main widget for the dashboard screen, handling tab navigation and user interactions.

classes.name: _DashboardScreenState
classes.description: State class for DashboardScreen, managing tab controller, data fetching, and UI updates.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the tab controller and triggers data fetch on authentication.

methods.name: _fetchOnAuth
methods.description: Fetches transactions after widget build if the user is authenticated and data hasn't been fetched yet.

methods.name: _refreshTx
methods.description: Refreshes transaction data from the provider.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the dashboard screen, including app bar, tabs, transaction list/chart, and logout functionality.
